title: Jaishankar pitches for global AI governance
description: NEW DELHI, Oct 7: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar on Tuesday pitched for a global governance structure to deal with issues relating to the use of artificial intelligence (AI). Addressing an event, Jaishankar underlined the need for responsible use of AI and argued that for a country like India, it means the development of indigenous tools, self-assessment protocols for innovators and establishing relevant guidelines. “Now, different societies have put different levels of emphasis on the benefits and on the risks […]
